dct_title_s: Panoramic view of Ovid Clinton Co. Michigan
dct_alternative_sm: Panomramic view of Ovid: Clinton Co., Michigan, looking Northwest.
dct_description_sm: North is oriented to the upper right corner of the map.
Bird's eyes view includes index of buildings and landmarks throughout the city. Also includes names of streets on the map.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
